game.name: A Sirius Game
game.genres: Action, Adventure, Casual, Indie, RPG, Simulation, Strategy

game.shortDescription: A Sirius Game is 3D, action-adventure game with RPG elements. It requires the player’s ship to escort other merchant ships to different ports unharmed by the pirates and also trade different items for money.
